info.title: OpenAlex API
info.description:
## OpenAlex API - MCP-ready Postman Collection

This Postman collection provides structured access to the OpenAlex API, a comprehensive, open index of scholarly entities such as:

- Works (papers, articles)
    
- Authors
    
- Institutions
    
- Sources (journals, venues)
    
- Topics (concepts)
    
- Publishers
    
- Funders
    

### Primary Use Cases

This collection is designed to support natural language agents or LLM-based assistants using the Model Context Protocol (MCP), with use cases such as:

- Searching for academic works filtered by topic, author, date, or institution
    
- Retrieving metadata for individual scholarly works or entities by ID
    
- Listing top institutions, authors, journals, or funders in a field
    
- Building research dashboards or intelligent assistants that query OpenAlex
    

### Getting Started

1. Import the collection into Postman.
    
2. Use the included examples (under each request) to understand typical query structures and response schemas.
    
3. No authentication is required to access the OpenAlex API.
    
4. All requests are made via `GET` to the base URL: `https://api.openalex.org`
    

### For LLM Integrations

This collection is fully compatible with Postman's AI toolchain and can be used to generate an MCP server to enable structured API access from AI agents.

- Each request includes saved examples for MCP schema generation
    
- Entity endpoints follow a consistent pattern: `GET /` and `GET //{id}`
    
- Responses reflect OpenAlex’s live data format for reliable modeling
    

Learn more about OpenAlex: [https://docs.openalex.org/](https://docs.openalex.org/)

Learn more about MCP: [https://www.postman.com/ai/](https://www.postman.com/ai/)

get.description:
Search and filter works with query parameters.

The results are sorted by relevance, with the best match first.

---
**Examples:**
- List works: `{}`
- List works from the 1st january 2025: `{'filter': 'from_publication_date:2025-01-01'}`
- List works with authors from US institutions: `{'filter': 'authorships.institutions.country_code:US'}`
- List works related to the Sustainable Development Goal with ID `1`: `{'filter': 'sustainable_development_goals.id:1'}`
- List works cited more than 100 times: `{'filter': 'cited_by_count:>100'}`
- List works related to the concept of `quantum computing`: `{'search': 'quantum%20computing'}`
- List works authored by a specific author with ORCID `0000-0001-2345-6789`: `{'filter': 'authorships.author.orcid:0000-0001-2345-6789'}`
- Amount of APC paid by institution with ID `I5124864` from 2020 to 2023: `{'filter': 'authorships.institutions.id:I5124864,publication_year:2020-2023', 'apc_sum': 'true'}`
- List most cited works published by institution with ID `I5124864` about artificial intelligence: `{'search': 'artificial intelligence', 'filter': 'authorships.institutions.id:I5124864', 'sort': 'cited_by_count:desc'}`
- List articles in Gold Open Access published by institution in Switzerland since 2020: `{'filter': 'authorships.institutions.country_code:CH,type:article,open_access.oa_status:gold,publication_year:2020-'}`
- Get count of works by OA status: `{'group_by': 'oa_status'}`
- List journal articles from the University of Florida since 2012-08-24: `{'filter': 'institutions.ror:https://ror.org/02y3ad647,type:article,from_publication_date:2012-08-24,is_paratext:false'}`
- Get OA journal articles of University of Florida group by year: `{'page': '1', 'filter': 'authorships.institutions.lineage:I138006243,open_access.is_oa:true,primary_location.source.type:journal', 'group_by': 'publication_year'}`
- Get count of works by SDG for University of Alberta since 2010: `{'page': '1', 'filter': 'publication_year:2010-,authorships.institutions.lineage:I168635309', 'group_by': 'sustainable_development_goals.id'}`
- Get main authors on Kelp forest since 2013: `{'page': '1', 'filter': 'default.search:kelp+forest,primary_location.source.type:journal,publication_year:2013-', 'group_by': 'authorships.author.id'}`
- Get main journals where authors of UCLA and UBC are publishing in collaboration: `{'page': '1', 'filter': 'authorships.institutions.lineage:I141945490+I161318765,type:article,primary_location.source.type:journal,authors_count:1-10', 'group_by': 'primary_location.source.id'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limi the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

parameters.name: apc_sum
parameters.description: Returns total APC values in the meta section

parameters.name: cited_by_count_sum
parameters.description: Returns the total citation counts in the meta section

example_3.summary: List works with authors from US institutions

example_4.summary: List works related to the Sustainable Development Goal with ID `1`

example_5.summary: List works cited more than 100 times

example_6.summary: List works related to the concept of `quantum computing`

example_7.summary: List works authored by a specific author with ORCID `0000-0001-2345-6789`

example_8.summary: Amount of APC paid by institution with ID `I5124864` from 2020 to 2023

example_9.summary: List most cited works published by institution with ID `I5124864` about artificial intelligence

example_10.summary: List articles in Gold Open Access published by institution in Switzerland since 2020

example_11.summary: Get count of works by OA status

example_12.summary: List journal articles from the University of Florida since 2012-08-24

example_13.summary: Get OA journal articles of University of Florida group by year

example_14.summary: Get count of works by SDG for University of Alberta since 2010

example_15.summary: Get main authors on Kelp forest since 2013

example_16.summary: Get main journals where authors of UCLA and UBC are publishing in collaboration

get.description:
Retrieve a specific work by its OpenAlex ID.

---
**Examples:**
- Get work by internal OpenAlex ID: `{}`
- Get work by DOI ID: `{}`
- Get work by Pubmed ID: `{}`
- Display only the id and display_name for the work ID `W2741809807`: `{'select': 'id,display_name'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

example_1.summary: Get work by internal OpenAlex ID

example_4.summary: Display only the id and display_name for the work ID `W2741809807`

get.description:
Search and filter authors with query parameters.

The results are sorted by relevance, with the best match first.

---
**Examples:**
- List authors sorted by cited by count, descending: `{'sort': 'cited_by_count:desc'}`
- Second page of list authors, with 50 results returned per page: `{'per_page': '50', 'page': '2'}`
- Get counts of authors by their institution type: `{'group_by': 'last_known_institution.continent'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id,display_name,orcid

example_1.summary: List authors sorted by cited by count, descending

example_2.summary: Second page of list authors, with 50 results returned per page

example_3.summary: Get counts of authors by their institution type

get.description:
Retrieve an author by OpenAlex ID.

---
**Examples:**
- Get author by OpenAlex ID: `{}`
- Get author by Orcid ID: `{}`
- Display only the id and display_name and orcid for the author ID `A5042962646`: `{'select': 'id,display_name,orcid'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

example_3.summary: Display only the id and display_name and orcid for the author ID `A5042962646`

get.description:
Search and filter institutions with query parameters.

The results are sorted by relevance, with the best match first.

---
**Examples:**
- List institutions: `{}`
- List institutions sorted by works count, descending: `{'sort': 'works_count:desc'}`
- Search institutions for San Diego State University: `{'search': 'san%20diego%20state%20university'}`
- List institutions with names containing `technology`: `{'filter': 'display_name.search:technology'}`
- List institutions having lack of ROR ID: `{'filter': 'has_ror:false'}`
- List institutions located in South America: `{'filter': 'continent:south_america'}`
- Get counts of institutions by country code: `{'group_by': 'country_code'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

example_2.summary: List institutions sorted by works count, descending

example_3.summary: Search institutions for San Diego State University

example_5.summary: List institutions having lack of ROR ID

example_6.summary: List institutions located in South America

example_7.summary: Get counts of institutions by country code

---
**Examples:**
- Get institution by OpenAlex ID: `{}`
- Get institution by ROR ID: `{}`
- Display only the id and display_name of the institution ID `I27837315`: `{'select': 'id,display_name'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

get.description:
Search and filter topics with query parameters.

The results are sorted by relevance, with the best match first.

---
**Examples:**
- List topics: `{}`
- Sort topics by cited by count, descending: `{'sort': 'cited_by_count:desc'}`
- Get the second page of topics results, with 50 results returned per page: `{'per_page': '50', 'page': '2'}`
- Display only id and display_name of institutions results: `{'select': 'id,display_name,description'}`
- Get counts of topics by domain: `{'group_by': 'domain.id'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the field that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

example_2.summary: Sort topics by cited by count, descending

example_3.summary: Get the second page of topics results, with 50 results returned per page

example_4.summary: Display only id and display_name of institutions results

example_5.summary: Get counts of topics by domain

**Examples:**
- Get topic by OpenAlex ID: `{}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

get.description:
Search and filter publishers with query parameters.

The results are sorted by relevance, with the best match first.

---
**Examples:**
- Sort publishers by display name, descending: `{'sort': 'display_name:desc'}`
- Display only the id, display_name, and alternate_titles within publishers results: `{'select': 'id,display_name,alternate_titles'}`
- Get counts of publishers by country_codes: `{'group_by': 'country_codes'}`
- Search publishers' display_name and alternate_titles for `springer`: `{'search': 'springer'}`
- Get the second page of publishers results, with 50 results returned per page: `{'per_page': '50', 'page': '2'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the field that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

example_1.summary: Sort publishers by display name, descending

example_2.summary: Display only the id, display_name, and alternate_titles within publishers results

example_3.summary: Get counts of publishers by country_codes

example_4.summary: Search publishers' display_name and alternate_titles for `springer`

example_5.summary: Get the second page of publishers results, with 50 results returned per page

- Get publisher by OpenAlex ID: `{}`
- Get publisher by Wikidata ID: `{}`

get.description:
Search and filter funders with query parameters.

The results are sorted by relevance, with the best match first.

---
**Examples:**
- List funders: `{}`
- Get the second page of funders results, with 50 results returned per page: `{'per_page': '50', 'page': '2'}`
- Sort funders by display name, descending: `{'sort': 'display_name:desc'}`
- Display only the id, display_name, and alternate_titles within funders results: `{'select': 'id,display_name,alternate_titles'}`
- Get counts of funders by country_code: `{'group_by': 'country_code'}`
- Search funders' display_name, alternate_titles, and description for `health`: `{'search': 'health'}`
- Get funders located in Canada: `{'filter': 'country_code:ca'}`

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit the fields that are returned, e.g. id, display_name

example_3.summary: Sort funders by display name, descending

example_4.summary: Display only the id, display_name, and alternate_titles within funders results

example_5.summary: Get counts of funders by country_code

example_6.summary: Search funders' display_name, alternate_titles, and description for `health`
